name: PatentResearch
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: patent research
Developer Terms of Use
des: Good research is the foundation for any successful project or business venture. Patents provide technical, competitor and legal information that assist in identifying opportunities and obstacles. Every inventor should should consider getting patent protection and evaluation of the invention should be done early in the development process. Inventors should know how to do perform patent research and this skill gives you databases and some basic instruction on how to use them. The search process will help you define how your invention is new and different.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
